title: Spaceland Sci-Fi Indie Tactics
description: Perhaps the most dynamic turn-based strategy in the spirit of the old school tactics. Less covers, more action. Land on the lost planet and give the mutants hell. Shoot, kick, blow, crush. You will gather the most desperate team of fighters and unravel the secrets of the mystical planet in the best traditions of science fiction genre.

system_requirements.Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 550 or AMD Radeon HD 5000
